title: FIA, Hellenic Police Greece forge alliance to Tackle Human Trafficking
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 15 (APP): The Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) and the Hellenic Police of Greece have solidified their commitment to international cooperation in the battle against Human Trafficking and Migrant Smuggling by formalizing a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU).
Under the careful guidance of DG FIA, the formalization of this MoU signifies a pivotal moment in the unwavering effort to combat Human Trafficking and Migrant Smuggling.
This strategic collaboration will enable the exchange of critical information, bolster mutual support in criminal investigations, and promote capacity-building endeavours.
This significant accord mirrors the dedication of both entities, united in their resolve to combat transnational crimes and ensure the prosecution of wrongdoers.
